heroSubtitle: Dive into my universe of development, design, and digital experiments
aboutSubtitle: Developer â€¢ AI Enthusiast â€¢ Creative Thinker
aboutContent: Namaste! I'm Ankit Raj, a B.Tech CSE (AIML) student passionate about building intelligent systems and impactful tech. My journey from a small town to the world of Artificial Intelligence is driven by grit, dreams, and an endless curiosity to explore the unknown.

aboutPersonalInfo.name: Ankit Raj
aboutPersonalInfo.education: B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering (AI & ML), GITAM University, Jhajjar
aboutPersonalInfo.personalStory: Growing up without guidance, I had to explore every step of my academic and technical journey on my own. With a deep passion for AI/ML and a determination to rise above limitations, I now work on impactful tech projects while leading the GfG Campus Body as President.

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.description: My tech journey began with a fascination for how machines can learn. I started exploring coding with C++ and gradually stepped into Python and AI.

deepDive.title: Deep Dive
deepDive.description: These years were about mastering the fundamentals â€” from DSA to deep learning. I spent days and nights building mini-projects, learning frameworks, and building the foundation of 'Luciverse'.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Now I'm building AI chatbots, real-time systems, and experimental AI tools from scratch â€” no shortcuts, no copy-paste. I'm also mentoring peers, leading communities, and creating platforms that matter.

aboutPhilosophy.coreBelief: Tech should uplift, not replace. Real innovation serves humanity.

principles.magical: Technology should feel seamless and intuitive

aboutWhyAI.introduction: AI/ML fascinates me because it mimics human intelligence and has the potential to automate, enhance, and revolutionize industries.
aboutWhyAI.humanAISynergy: I believe AI is at its best when it collaborates with human intelligence â€” combining logic with empathy, data with experience.
aboutWhyAI.realWorldImpact: My goal is to create AI solutions that address grassroots-level problems â€” from education access to environment monitoring and assistive tech.

contactInfo.availability: Open to collaborations, mentorship, and idea-sharing

projectsSubtitle: Showcasing innovative solutions and creative experiments
projectsDescription: From AI chatbots like Aida to smart IoT boats, my projects reflect a deep drive to build meaningful and efficient tech. Stay tuned as I keep adding more!
